name: Quick Asian Pork Stir-Fry
ingredients: 16 ounce bag frozen Asian-style vegetable mixture *
1 tablespoon granular Splenda or equivalent liquid Splenda
1/2 teaspoon ground ginger, or to taste
1 teaspoon Sambal Oelek, or to taste
1-2 tablespoons cooking oil (if using lean ground pork)

instructions.en: If using lean pork, heat 1-2 tbsp cooking oil in a large skillet or wok.
instructions.sk: Ak používate chudé bravčové, rozohrejte 1-2 lyžice oleja na varenie vo veľkej panvici alebo woku.
instructions.ja: 脂肪の少ない豚肉を使用する場合、大きなフライパンまたは中華鍋で1-2大さじの調理油を熱します。

instructions.en: Brown ground pork with onions and garlic.
instructions.sk: Opečte mleté bravčové mäso s cibuľou a cesnakom.
instructions.ja: 挽き肉を玉ねぎとニンニクと一緒に炒めます。

instructions.en: Add frozen vegetables and remaining ingredients. Cook until vegetables are done as desired.
instructions.sk: Pridajte mrazenú zeleninu a zvyšné ingrediencie. Varte, kým zelenina nie je hotová podľa vašej chuti.
instructions.ja: 冷凍野菜と残りの材料を加えます。野菜が好みの柔らかさになるまで調理します。

instructions.en: Sprinkle xanthan gum over surface, stir in quickly. Let stand to thicken sauce.
instructions.sk: Posypte povrch xantánovou gumou, rýchlo zamiešajte. Nechajte postáť, aby omáčka zhustla.
instructions.ja: キサンタンガムを表面に振りかけ、素早く混ぜます。ソースが濃くなるまで少し置きます。

notes: Makes 4 servings. *Frozen Asian-style vegetable mixtures vary in composition. **2 packets of True Lime can be used instead of lime juice. Carb counts are approximate due to variation in vegetable mixtures.
